title: Round up review: KOM Saddle Tool Roll and Tube Strap
content:
KOM Cycling hopes to soon be a household name in the cycling community. If you check out the KOM Cycling site, you’ll notice there’s a lot of new products on the way — from cycling computer mounts to trainer desks. The company does a little bit of everything, and from what we’ve reviewed — they

The post Round up review: KOM Saddle Tool Roll and Tube Strap appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
